General.Name: HannsTouch Solution Inc
General.Description: HannsTouch Holdings Company manufactures and sells touch panels in Taiwan, South Korea, China, and Europe. The company offers touching solutions for AMOLED and LCD monitors, wearable devices, cellphones, tablets, laptops, one-piece forming PC and industrial monitors, etc.; and TFT backplane solutions for RFID, e-book, e-board, etc. It also engages in the leasing of properties; hotel business; and food and beverage services. The company was formerly known as HannsTouch Solution Incorporated and changed its name to HannsTouch Holdings Company in June 2023. HannsTouch Holdings Company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.7, Beiyuan 1st Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 74149
